title: Tracking stars in the night sky
description: In this tutorial, we'll see how to use covalent to manage all the tasks involved in tracking the position of a star in the users' night sky. Stars and other celestial objects have coordinates distributed on the celestial sphere, a projected sphere surrounding the Earth, and tracking celestial objects means transforming celestial coordinates into Earth coordinates at a particular location.
